name: Glacier Stainless Microlite 720 ml Vacuum Bottle

features: Impossibly thin, 2mm walls are actually thinner than most single wall plastic bottles for an amazingly compact footprint that fits anywhere.
18/8 stainless steel boasts unrivaled purity and durability.
Push-button, flip top cap locks closed for transport and locks open for easy drinking.
Includes: Locking, Push Button Lid, 720 ml Vacuum Bottle.
Dimensions : 3.3” x 3.3” x 9.9”(84 x 84 x 251 mm)
